name: Guard
description: You served as a guard, standing watch over the walls and gates of a settlement, keeping a keen eye out for threats. Your experience taught you vigilance and the value of physical strength in maintaining order.

features.name: Alert
features.description: You add your Proficiency Bonus to Initiative rolls. You can't be Surprised while conscious. Other creatures don't gain Advantage on attack rolls against you as a result of being unseen by you.
